name: what do you want? (fenced forest media // blake s.)
name_original: what do you want? (fenced forest media // blake s.)
description:
roll a backstory for any rpg character.

may contain some mature / inappropriate material and DEFINITELY allows for evil / violent / oppressive motivations. by including possible actions or motives of characters, the creator of this generator does not necessarily endorse those actions or motives, or the playstyles that may result from playing characters with those motivations. be safe and kind at the table, even if your PC isn't.
